word: EVEN BEFORE THE DELEGATES ASSEMBLED AT MINNEAPOLIS THERE HAD BEEN DISPUTE ON THE KEY THEOLOGICAL TOPICS FOR SEVERAL YEARS. THERE WAS ALSO BUILDING IN THE HEARTS OF SOME AN ATTITUDE OF RESISTANCE TO AND NONACCEPTANCE OF ELLEN WHITE'S MESSAGES OF WARNING AND REPROOF. SHE EARLY OBSERVED A STRANGE AND ANTAGONISTIC ATTITUDE MANIFESTED TOWARD HER BY SOME OF THE LEADING MINISTERS.
